A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi simply put\, is an absolutely thrilling\, two and a half hour long ride. If you analyze too many details within the film\, or go into it thinking that youre going to see the story youve wanted to be told for the last two years\, youll be disapointed. But Rian Johnson brought an unconvential story to life in the most exciting and natural way\, that only a skilled director could. Dont think too much about the film and how it fits in the Star Wars series\, and just appreciate the magic.
